answers: A line has two ends, unlike a segment.

A line has no starting point, unlike a segment.

questions.question: If side BC is longer than side AB in a triangle, what can be said about the angles?
answers: Angle opposite AB is greater than the angle opposite BC
Angle opposite BC is greater than the angle opposite AB
The triangle is always a right triangle

questions.question: According to the Triangle Inequality Theorem, which statement is true?
answers: The sum of the lengths of two sides equals the third side
The sum of the lengths of two sides is less than the third side
The difference of the lengths of two sides is greater than the third side
The sum of the lengths of two sides is greater than the third side

questions.question: What type of transformation is translation?
answers: We rotate a figure a certain degree around a point.
We enlarge or reduce a figure
We flip a figure over a line.
We slide a figure in any direction.

questions.question: What type of transformation is reflection?
answers: We slide a figure in any direction.
We enlarge or reduce a figure
We flip a figure over a line.
We rotate a figure a certain degree around a point.

questions.question: What type of transformation is rotation?
answers: We enlarge or reduce a figure
We flip a figure over a line.
We slide a figure in any direction.
We rotate a figure a certain degree around a point.
